Description of incident: Five laptops were stolen from an unnamed auditor of Petco's 401(k) Plan between May 18 and May 20.  The auditor informed Petco on July3.  Current and former employee names, Social Security numbers, and other 401(k) account information may have been exposed. Anyone who was issued a Petco paycheck in 2010, had a 401(k) account and received a distribution, or had a fee deducted from their account in 2011 may have been affected.
